subject: Sailboats and Sailing
America's Cup
lead_paragraph: The high-performance yachts being used at this year’s Cup have a spectacular capacity to foil, or sail with both hulls out of the water to appear as though they are levitating.
snippet: The high-performance yachts being used at this year’s Cup have a spectacular capacity to foil, or sail with both hulls out of the water to appear as though they are levitating.
